Name: Big City Rigs: Garbage Truck Driver
About the game: Whoever said collecting trash won't pay the bills? Hop in the seat of your very own garbage truck and clean up and collect the trash as you manage your own waste utilization company. 34 missions take you through various environments, including city streets, industrial areas, business centers and more. Not your typical garbage truck! Choose your own corporate look: vehicle color, name and logo Manage new hires, maintain vehicles, and deploy the right personnel to the right routes â€” get ready to watch your company grow! Solve special tasks like waste glass containers, construction waste, toxic waste and more
